definition: to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: I think she is not afraid to speak out.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲她不害怕實話實說。

sentences.english: I’m going to tell him, trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我跟他實話實說算了，就信任他這一回。

sentences.english: Speak the truth always, even if it leads to your death.
sentences.chinese: 不打誑語，即使實話實說會招來殺身之禍。

sentences.english: But honesty is still usually the best policy.
sentences.chinese: 但實話實說仍然是最好的方式。

sentences.english: But I have to be truthful and fair.
sentences.chinese: 但是我必須實話實說，主持公正。

sentences.english: I sll the time shout it love it is but, untotunately, at whens the truth hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我一向實話實說，只是有具體時間實話會傷心。

sentences.english: It makes me feel like a politician to tell you the truth.
sentences.chinese: 這使我看起來像是實話實說的政治家。

sentences.english: To tell the truth, first entered university, I do not really sensible.
sentences.chinese: 實話實說，剛進大學的時候，我還真不懂事。

sentences.english: Tell the truth; do not embellish the story.
sentences.chinese: 實話實說，不要加油添醋。

sentences.english: Stager learned the best way to deal with these new realities is to be honest.
sentences.chinese: 斯泰戈知道處理這類新狀況的最好辦法是實話實說。

sentences.english: It is a blessing when people tell the truth!
sentences.chinese: 人們能夠實話實說是件好事。

sentences.english: If you tell me the truth, you won't get in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你跟我實話實說，我保你沒事兒。

sentences.english: Practically all the scientists I have ever met are not like this.
sentences.chinese: 實話實說，我見過的全部科學家都不像這樣。

sentences.english: So, to be honest with you, I'm watching nothing on television lately.
sentences.chinese: 所以，實話實說，我最近什麼都沒看。

sentences.english: Tom did not mean to hurt you; he was just telling the truth.
sentences.chinese: 湯母無意傷害你，他只是實話實說罷了。

definition: to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
angry words/sth said in the moment of anger
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
sneering/sarcasm/cynical remarks
nothing serious/just hot air
to both be willing/mutual consent
to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
gossip/hearsay/rumor
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
way/method/means/Taiwan pr. [fa1 r5]
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom)/fig. to speak in a roundabout way/to equivocate/to beat about the bush
personal attack
